Headline: #49 Western Temporary Reroute near Madison/Western
ShortDescription: #49 Western rr SB via Western, Washington, California, Jackson & Western; NB via Western, Jackson, California, Warren & Western near Madison/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Madison/Western.

  • Southbound buses will operate via Western, Washington, California, Jackson, then resume normal route on Western.
  • Northbound buses will operate via Western, Jackson, California, Warren, then resume normal route on Western.

Allow extra travel time.
